title: In Rural Alabama, Limited Access To Obstetrics Care
teaser: Only 17 of 54 of Alabama's rural counties have hospitals that offer obstetrics services. It's one of the state's greatest healthcare challenges. NPR's Karen Grigsby Bates speaks with journalist Anna Claire Vollers of AL.com and Dale Quinney of the Alabama Rural Health Association.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
